entries.title_d: Removing the Lice: A freighter is enroute carrying pesticides that will free the station from the lice infestation brought about by a recent cargo delivery. Be alert for an attack by the Ay'Nat pirates, who seem to think the cargo is something more valuable.
entries.title: Dathomir System: Escort the Freighter
entries.thanks_5: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Thank you for getting us through. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.thanks_4: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Thank you for getting us through. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.thanks_3: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Thank you for getting us through. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.thanks_2: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Thank you for getting us through. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.thanks_1: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Thank you for getting us through. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.taunt_1: This is nothing personal, just business.
entries.shields_depleted: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Our shields are down.  If you plan on doing something, now would be a good time. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.reason_5: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Let's get underway, and may the force be with us today. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.reason_4: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Let's get underway, and may the force be with us today. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.reason_3: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Let's get underway, and may the force be with us today. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.reason_2: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 I hope you are the best escort we have to offer. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.reason_1: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Thanks for the escort. I didn't expect us to draw such attention. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel here to meet up with the freighter
entries.quest_location_d: An escort route in the Dathomir System
entries.quest_escort_d: Protect this target carrying the pesticides needed by the station to rid itself of a lice infestation.
entries.hull_half: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 We are getting shot up pretty bad over here, keep those fighters off of us. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.goodbye_5: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Nice bit of flying there, I was worried for a bit. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.goodbye_4: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Nice bit of flying there, I was worried for a bit. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.goodbye_3: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 Nice bit of flying there, I was worried for a bit. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.goodbye_2: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 We should be safe from here. Thank you for the protection. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.goodbye_1: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 We made it. Another successful day in the life of a flying target. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.found_loc: \#pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Rendezvous waypoint has been set. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_protect: \#pcontrast3 Station Command: < \#pcontrast1 The freighter was driven off course and is now lost.  We needed the pesticides they were delivering to get rid of this lice infestation! \#pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_destroy: \#pcontrast3 Station Command: < \#pcontrast1 You allowed the freighter to be destroyed.  We needed the pesticides they were delivering to get rid of this lice infestation! \#pcontrast3 >
entries.complete: \#pcontrast3 Station Command: < \#pcontrast1 The freighter should be safe from here.  Good job. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_stopped: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Hostile activity has ceased. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Ships approacing on attack vector. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.arrived_at_loc: \#pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < \#pcontrast3 Rendezvous point reached.  The freighter will arive shortly. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.abort: \#pcontrast3 Freighter: < \#pcontrast1 The command to abort has been given, our mission is a failure. \#pcontrast3 >
